column4: i'm planning on doing an upgrade to 8.04 from 7.10. i have several KDE apps installed (ktorrent k3b etc..) plus avant window navigator.. i know avant is now a package installed by default in 8.04. should i remove them before upgrading? kde apps are 3.5 .. will 8.04 be adding kde 4.0 apps? should i remove the current kde apps and reinstall after the upgrade?
chalcedony; it didn't go so well? how so?
i would definitely delete some .??? files in your home directory except for a select few so they can rebuild from the new install
